<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements support for context disambiguation of allocation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calls for profile guided heap optimization. Specifically, it uses Memprof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profiles which indicate context specific allocation behavior (currently</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distinguishing cold vs hot memory allocations). Cloning is performed to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expose the cold allocation call contexts, and the allocation calls are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subsequently annotated with an attribute for later transformation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The transformations can be performed either directly on IR (regular LTO), or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on a ThinLTO index (and later applied to the IR during the ThinLTO backend).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Both types of LTO operate on a the same base graph representation, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// uses CRTP to support either IR or Index formats.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// CRTP base for graphs built from either IR or ThinLTO summary index.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The graph represents the call contexts in all memprof metadata on allocation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// calls, with nodes for the allocations themselves, as well as for the calls</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in each context. The graph is initially built from the allocation memprof</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">/// metadata (or summary) MIBs. It is then updated to match calls with callsite</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">/// metadata onto the nodes, updating it to reflect any inlining performed on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">/// those calls.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Each MIB (representing an allocation&#39;s call context with allocation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// behavior) is assigned a unique context id during the graph build. The edges</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and nodes in the graph are decorated with the context ids they carry. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is used to correctly update the graph when cloning is performed so that we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">/// can uniquify the context for a single (possibly cloned) allocation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DerivedCCG, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FuncTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CallTy&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/#a24a25f8f197ec2041fd2a9efcd4160b1">CallsiteContextGraph</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// particular inlined context may include stack ids A-&gt;B, and we may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// never profiled in sequence in a single MIB for any allocation (i.e.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we might have profiled an allocation that involves the callsite A,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but through a different one of its callee callsites, and we might</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StackSequenceContextIds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a9a3c9d867ff6bde97841c2b7983f5c70">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><Highlight kind="normal">          Skip = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If some of this call&#39;s stack ids did not have corresponding nodes (due</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to pruning), don&#39;t include any context ids for contexts that extend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// beyond these nodes. Otherwise we would be matching part of unrelated /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not fully matching stack contexts. To do this, subtract any context ids</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ids.back() != getLastStackId(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3e1137200d6e86367be1d605fdc14e6c">set&#95;subtract</a>(StackSequenceContextIds, PE-&gt;getContextIds());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StackSequenceContextIds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a9a3c9d867ff6bde97841c2b7983f5c70">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we now have no context ids for clone, skip this call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StackSequenceContextIds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a9a3c9d867ff6bde97841c2b7983f5c70">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the prior call had the same stack ids this set would not be empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we already have a call that &quot;matches&quot; because it is located</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the same function. If the Calls list was sorted properly we should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not encounter this situation as all such entries should be adjacent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and processed in bulk further below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DuplicateContextIds = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1; J &lt; Calls.size(); J++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;CallCtxInfo = Calls&#91;J&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NextFunc != Func) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;NextCall = CallCtxInfo.Call;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><Highlight kind="normal">        CallToMatchingCall&#91;NextCall&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update I so that it gets incremented correctly to skip this call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = J;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we don&#39;t have duplicate context ids, then we can assign all the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// context ids computed for the original node sequence to this call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are duplicate calls with the same stack ids then we synthesize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><Highlight kind="normal">              ? duplicateContextIds(StackSequenceContextIds, OldToNewContextIds)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><Highlight kind="normal">              : StackSequenceContextIds;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!SavedContextIds.empty());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><Highlight kind="normal">  propagateDuplicateContextIds(OldToNewContextIds);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><Highlight kind="normal">    check();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now perform a post-order traversal over the graph, starting with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for and workaround callsites that call multiple functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This can happen for indirect calls, which needs better handling, and in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// more rare cases (e.g. macro expansion).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: To fix this for indirect calls we will want to perform speculative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// devirtualization using either the normal PGO info with ICP, or using the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// information in the profiled MemProf contexts. We can do this prior to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this transformation for regular LTO, and for ThinLTO we can simulate that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// effect in the summary and perform the actual speculative devirtualization</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// while cloning in the ThinLTO backend.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep track of the new nodes synthesized for discovered tail calls missing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;CallInfo, ContextNode &#42;&gt;</a> TailCallToContextNodeMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = Entry.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check all node callees and see if in the same function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to check all of the calls recorded in this Node, because in some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cases we may have had multiple calls with the same debug info calling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different callees. This can happen, for example, when an object is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constructed in the paramter list - the destructor call of the object has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same debug info (line/col) as the call the object was passed to.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here we will prune any that don&#39;t match all callee nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;CallInfo&gt; AllCalls;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllCalls.reserve(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;MatchingCalls.size() + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllCalls.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Call);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllCalls.insert(AllCalls.end(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;MatchingCalls.begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;MatchingCalls.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First see if we can partition the calls by callee function, creating new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nodes to host each set of calls calling the same callees. This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// necessary for support indirect calls with ThinLTO, for which we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// synthesized CallsiteInfo records for each target. They will all have the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same callsite stack ids and would be sharing a context node at this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// point. We need to perform separate cloning for each, which will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// applied along with speculative devirtualization in the ThinLTO backends</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as needed. Note this does not currently support looking through tail</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calls, it is unclear if we need that for indirect call targets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First partition calls by callee func. Map indexed by func, value is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// struct with list of matching calls, assigned node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/#aa262bc6616e27d0c699be16373b96b60">partitionCallsByCallee</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>, AllCalls, NewCallToNode))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = AllCalls.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate through the calls until we find the first that matches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; It != AllCalls.end(); ++It) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisCall = &#42;It;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;CalleeEdges.begin(); EI != <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;CalleeEdges.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><Highlight kind="normal">           ++EI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge = &#42;EI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Edge-&gt;Callee-&gt;hasCall())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/#abf9d501260ea6a430e980b52e0c940f0">NodeToCallingFunc</a>.count(Edge-&gt;Callee));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the called function matches that of the callee node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!calleesMatch(ThisCall.call(), EI, TailCallToContextNodeMap)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Found a call that matches the callee nodes, we can quit now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the first match is not the primary call on the Node, update it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// now. We will update the list of matching calls further below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to clone.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to keep the original version as alloc type NotCold. This will make</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cases with indirect calls or any other situation with an unknown call to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the original function get the default behavior. We do this by sorting the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3355"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CallerEdges of the Node we will clone by alloc type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3356"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3357"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Give NotCold edge the lowest sort priority so those edges are at the end of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the caller edges vector, and stay on the original version (since the below</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3359"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code clones greedily until it finds all remaining edges have the same type</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3360"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and leaves the remaining ones on the original Node).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3361"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We shouldn&#39;t actually have any None type edges, so the sorting priority for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that is arbitrary, and we assert in that case below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllocTypeCloningPriority&#91;&#93; = &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;None&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 3, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NotCold&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 4,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3603"><Highlight kind="normal">                         : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;CallsiteInfo &#42;&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.call())-&gt;Clones.size()));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3605"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// each (by adding an entry to the Versions/Clones summary array), and copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3606"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// over the version being called for the function clone being cloned here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3607"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Additionally, add an entry to the CallMap for the new function clone,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the new call clone.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Inst : CallsWithMetadataInFunc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3611"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This map always has the initial version in it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3612"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Inst.cloneNo() == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3613"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;AI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AllocInfo &#42;&gt;</a>(Inst.call())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3614"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(AI-&gt;Versions.size() == CloneNo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We assign the allocation type later (in updateAllocationCall), just add</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3616"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an entry for it here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3617"><Highlight kind="normal">      AI-&gt;Versions.push&#95;back(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3618"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3620"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CI &amp;&amp; CI-&gt;Clones.size() == CloneNo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3621"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We assign the clone number later (in updateCall), just add an entry for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3623"><Highlight kind="normal">      CI-&gt;Clones.push&#95;back(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3628"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3629"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3630"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This method assigns cloned callsites to functions, cloning the functions as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3631"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// needed. The assignment is greedy and proceeds roughly as follows:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3632"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3633"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each function Func:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3634"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   For each call with graph Node having clones:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3635"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Initialize ClonesWorklist to Node and its clones</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3636"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Initialize NodeCloneCount to 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3637"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     While ClonesWorklist is not empty:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3638"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        Clone = pop front ClonesWorklist</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3639"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        NodeCloneCount++</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3640"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        If Func has been cloned less than NodeCloneCount times:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3641"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           If NodeCloneCount is 1:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3642"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             Assign Clone to original Func</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3643"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             Continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3644"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           Create a new function clone</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3645"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           If other callers not assigned to call a function clone yet:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3646"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//              Assign them to call new function clone</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3647"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//              Continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3648"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           Assign any other caller calling the cloned version to new clone</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3649"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3650"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        For each caller of Clone:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3651"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           If caller is assigned to call a specific function clone:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3652"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             If we cannot assign Clone to that function clone:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3653"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//               Create new callsite Clone NewClone</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3654"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//               Add NewClone to ClonesWorklist</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3655"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//               Continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3656"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             Assign Clone to existing caller&#39;s called function clone</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3657"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           Else:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3658"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             If Clone not already assigned to a function clone:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3659"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                Assign to first function clone without assignment</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3660"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//             Assign caller to selected function clone</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3661"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DerivedCCG, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FuncTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CallTy&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3662" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/#af222e51d6efae0aeb9ea76cac1b46300"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/#af222e51d6efae0aeb9ea76cac1b46300">CallsiteContextGraph&lt;DerivedCCG, FuncTy, CallTy&gt;::assignFunctions</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3663"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3664"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3665"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep track of the assignment of nodes (callsites) to function clones they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3666"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3667"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;ContextNode &#42;, FuncInfo&gt;</a> CallsiteToCalleeFuncCloneMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3668"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3669"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update caller node to call function version CalleeFunc, by recording the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3670"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// assignment in CallsiteToCalleeFuncCloneMap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecordCalleeFuncOfCallsite = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/contextnode">ContextNode</a> &#42;Caller,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3672"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/funcinfo">FuncInfo</a> &amp;CalleeFunc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3673"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Caller-&gt;hasCall());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3674"><Highlight kind="normal">    CallsiteToCalleeFuncCloneMap&#91;Caller&#93; = CalleeFunc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3675"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3676"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk all functions for which we saw calls with memprof metadata, and handle</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3678"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cloning for each of its calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;Func, CallsWithMetadata&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/#a19492f5e9a4b13d1b78b56c75b1f58a8">FuncToCallsWithMetadata</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3680"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/funcinfo">FuncInfo</a> OrigFunc(Func);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3681"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Map from each clone of OrigFunc to a map of remappings of each call of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3682"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interest (from original uncloned call to the corresponding cloned call in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3683"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that function clone).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3684"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::map&lt;FuncInfo, std::map&lt;CallInfo, CallInfo&gt;&gt; FuncClonesToCallMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3685"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a> : CallsWithMetadata) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3686"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memprofcontextdisambiguation-cpp-/callsitecontextgraph/contextnode">ContextNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = getNodeForInst(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3687"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip call if we do not have a node for it (all uses of its stack ids</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3688"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// were either on inlined chains or pruned from the MIBs), or if we did</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
